entry.title: VOTE
entry.text:
Voting supports the server and gives you materials in game to craft rare and power items.
Click the link below to vote!

entry.title: SHOP
entry.text:
You can use the sand dollar in game currency to buy items and materials from the online shop. To see your balance use /bal or /wallet Use /claim after buying to claim them in game.
Click the link below to shop!

entry.title: DISCORD
entry.text:
We have more information about the server and mods in our discord. We also have events and giveaways.
Click the link below to join!

entry.title: WEBSITE
entry.text:
You can visit our website to more about The Oasis and the other games we host.
Click the link below to visit!
